example.name: autogen1
example.text: an official explanation in the form of a memorandum from Chief of Staff George C. Marshall to President Roosevelt : `` 1,430 pounds of ammunition , '' he wrote his commander in chief , were expended on `` unidentified aircraft , '' flying at speeds as slow as 200 mph and elevations between 9,000 and 18,000 feet
example.arg: from Chief of Staff George C. Marshall

example.name: autogen2
example.text: the subject of memorandums from the chief executive
